title: FS: (3) scraps from the REA find a few years ago prices added
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: FS: (3) scraps from the REA find a few years ago prices added
posts.post_content:
For sale are (3) scraps or as some would say tweener scraps. Obviously hand cut but maybe not missing the color of true scrap. 

Collins- $700
White-$300
Milan- $500

At this point I am looking for an offer on one or all three. Needless to say I know the demand is down but nothing ventured nothing gained.

Also have a highly out of registration Hartsel for sale. 

Again looking for offers as I am not sure what these are currently bringing.

Thank you
Hate to highjack a thread but what are scraps? I've seen a lot of posts for them but haven't been able to find what they are through any searches.

I'll let the true experts chime in on this.  But my version of a simple explaination is any card that wasn't intended to be released into packs.  You'll notice for instance that each of these three appear to be hand cut - most likely from a printing press sheet many years ago.
Scott, that is about the case. Most scraps will have some signs (generally) of being hand cut.

great cards!!

I will give a post about what a scrap is a little later today:)
